author: TicklingNoise

text:
Cool song! And yeah, it's a pretty good game, unique, I agree. 

The music is pretty good all around, but some song's loops tend to be really short, so they sound repetitive.

I saw some David Jaffe on the credits last time I beat it, I wonder if it's the GoW guy.
